Name: Almandine Garnet Fe_3Al_2(SiO_4)_3
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicates
Subclass: Nesosilicates
Particle Size: 45-125um
Sample No.: NS-4A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, Arizona, Graham County, Stanley Butte
Collected by Burminco
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: ns04aa.txt
